name: aftermath
effect: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
short_effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
